channel.title: [PI]If Username Contains ____ Auto ban?[PI]
channel.description: How would I make it so if someone has something in their username, it auto bans them? Basically a username filter. I know this would help in someway: [code]String[] list = {"nigger", "cunt", "nigga", "fuck", "penis", "vagina", "dick", "shit", "cock"};[/code]

item.title: [PI]If Username Contains ____ Auto ban?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:4, topic:400747”]In the package src.server.net, there is a class called ‘RS2LoginProtocolDecoder’
Open it.
Search for ‘properName’
You should see something like:

Directly under that line, add this:

		String[] badWords = {"nigger", "cunt", "nigga", "fuck", "penis", "vagina", "dick", "shit", "cock"};
		for (String badWord : badWords) {
			if (cl.properName.contains(badWord)) {
				returnCode = 4;
			}
		}

Edit: Sorry, made a little mistake.[/quote]
Worked, tyvm.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]If Username Contains ____ Auto ban?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @eyeheartlax eyeheartlax
item.description:
@eyeheartlax wrote:

No, I pulled it out of a client.java file. So, I assume it would go in there xD

EDIT:
You might wanna try what he said ^^. He’s probably more experienced than I am. ;p

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]If Username Contains ____ Auto ban?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

In the package src.server.net, there is a class called ‘RS2LoginProtocolDecoder’
Open it.
Search for ‘properName’
You should see something like:

Directly under that line, add this:

		String[] badWords = {"nigger", "cunt", "nigga", "fuck", "penis", "vagina", "dick", "shit", "cock"};
		for (String badWord : badWords) {
			if (cl.properName.contains(badWord)) {
				returnCode = 4;
			}
		}

Edit: Sorry, made a little mistake.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]If Username Contains ____ Auto ban?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“eyeheartlax, post:2, topic:400747”]I believe this would make it so that they won’t even be able to make the account, it would just say something like “Sorry, can’t use that username.”

if(playerName.contains("fuck")){ returnCode = 20; disconnected = true; return; }
If it does, or doesn’t work please let me know.[/quote]
Would I put that in the initialize method?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]If Username Contains ____ Auto ban?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @eyeheartlax eyeheartlax
item.description:
@eyeheartlax wrote:

I believe this would make it so that they won’t even be able to make the account, it would just say something like “Sorry, can’t use that username.”

if(playerName.contains("fuck")){ returnCode = 20; disconnected = true; return; }
If it does, or doesn’t work please let me know.

Read full topic
